task.title: Adding Photos from the Web
task.shortdesc: If you use a website other than Flickr or Photobucket to store your photos, you can still add them to your project or stash pages.

context.p: Pulling images from the web is known as slurping. Please only do this if you have permission from the host.

step.cmd: In the field, type or paste the complete URL for your photo and click Slurp It!.

step.note: If you aren't the copyright owner of the photo you're using, please make sure you have permission to use it.
step.cmd: To change the copyright notice below your photo, just click on it and type in the correct information.
